title: Nancy Pelosi, Vilified by G.O.P. for Years, Is a Top Target of Threats
description: The attack on the husband of Speaker Nancy Pelosi, which appeared to target her, came after more than a decade of Republican efforts to demonize and dehumanize the most powerful woman in Washington.
dc:creator: Annie Karni, Catie Edmondson and Carl Hulse
media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:description: Speaker Nancy Pelosi, accompanied by her security detail and staff members in the Capitol.
